original: The police computer gives access to criminal records. Looking at your own, you see that
you are on the "most wanted" list and they plan to punish you severely.
your arrest is a priority and they have enough on you to warrant extreme punishment.
your arrest is being actively sought and they have enough on you to warrant heavy punishment.
an arrest warrant has been issued for you and they have enough to warrant serious punishment.
an arrest warrant has been issued for you and they have enough to warrant significant punishment.
an arrest warrant has been issued for you. They have enough evidence to warrant a punishment.
they may soon have enough on you to issue an arrest warrant.
they have nothing significant on you.
Options:
Installing a Wiper worm will destroy lots of police records on everyone, including you.
Framing someone will attach all evidence on you to someone else. This should mislead the police.
However, you can only attach it to those who already have a record in the system.
<<link [[Install Wiper|Police Sneak Caught]]>><</link>>
<<link [[Frame Whitney|Police Sneak Caught]]>><</link>>
<<link [[Frame Leighton|Police Sneak Caught]]>><</link>>
You have already framed <> for your crimes - you cannot do it again until they have paid for your crimes.

<<link [[Install Wiper (0:10)|Police Computer]]>><<pass 10>><<set $phase to 11>><<crimeDown 0.5 "all">><<set _randomCrime to ((random(5,35) + 20)/100)>><<crimeDown _randomCrime "all">><<set $police_delete += 1>><</link>>
<<link [[Frame Whitney (0:10)|Police Computer]]>><<pass 10>><<set $phase to 12>><<crimeClear "all">><<set $police_delete += 1>><</link>>
<<link [[Frame Leighton (0:10)|Police Computer]]>><<pass 10>><<set $phase to 13>><<crimeClear "all">><<set $police_delete += 1>><</link>>
You have already framed <> for your crimes - you cannot do it again until they have paid for your crimes.
Options:
Deleting electronic evidence will reduce the amount of crime they can pin on you and should not be detected.
Installing a Wiper worm will destroy lots of police records on everyone, including you.
<<link [[Delete evidence|Police Sneak Caught]]>><</link>>
<<link [[Install Wiper|Police Sneak Caught]]>><</link>>
<<link [[Delete evidence (0:15)|Police Computer]]>><<pass 15>><<set $phase to 10>><<set _randomCrime to ((random(5,35) + 20)/100)>><<crimeDown _randomCrime "all">><<set $police_delete += 1>><</link>>
<<link [[Install Wiper (0:10)|Police Computer]]>><<pass 10>><<set $phase to 11>><<crimeDown 0.5 "all">><<set $police_delete += 1>><</link>>
